features: [Reliable Button Top Battery] - Diameter: 18.8 mm, length: 68 mm. Powo 18B battery is tested by professional testers under strict quality control standards. Obtain CE, UL and ROHS certification. Completely prevent overheating and leakage, so that you can charge and use safely.Product Patent Number：6319876 （This product is frequently returned because buyers buy the wrong battery. Please note: this product is not an AA/AAA battery and is not suitable for electronic cigarette devices)

[Real Large Capacity And Excellent Performance] - Powo 18B battery has a real 3000 MAH, supports a stable output voltage of 3.7 V, and makes the equipment work more stable and durable.there are great replacement batteries for high frequently used devices. A fully charged battery can run your flashlight or headlamp for 2-4 hours / doorbell for 3-6 months / small fan for 3-4 hours.
[Multipurpose & 1000 + Cycles] - no memory effect. It can be charged more than 1000 times. It is very suitable for flashlight, camera, UAV, headlamp, remote control vehicle, etc.
[Portable Battery Case] - each package comes with 4 batteries and a compact battery case (3 inches x 2.7 inches x 0.78 inches), which you can easily put into your pocket as a backup battery.

[Package Includes] - Rechargeable 3000mAh battery x 4,battery protective cover x 1. Note: the battery needs a charger (not included) .This battery can be used with our exclusive battery charger. You can search ASIN: B0F1S4VSNN on the Amazon.co.uk to purchase it. If you have any questions, please contact us
description: Product Description POWOBEST 3.7v 3000mAh Rechargeable Battery! Wide Application for High Drain Device, Such as Video Doorbell, Small Fan, Mini Speaker, Controller, Flashlight, Headlamp, Wall lamp, Toy car, etc. Diameter: 18.8mm, length: 68mm Steady Voltage: 3.7 Volt; High Capacity: 3000 mAh Rechargeable : Can be recharged over 1000 times, no memory effect Charging time: 5 hours full charge with POWOBEST original battery charger ( battery charge is not included) Pakcage include: 4pcs battery, 1 compact battery case(3" x 2.7" x 0.78") Tips: POWOBEST batteries can be used with POWOBEST battery chargers. You can search for ASIN: B0DSJ2PNDY on the amazon.co.uk to purchase. The battery case will help much: 1. Battery Organizer: Organize, store and protect your batteries. 2. Easy To Carry: Take the batteries anywhere. 3. Safety protection: Prevent any unwanted contact. 3000mAh High Capacity POWO18B 3.7 volt rechargeable batteries have high capacity of 3000mAh, which last a long time to keep your device going strong. Recharged Over 1000 Times POWO18B 3.7v battery can be recharged over 1000 times. Perfect for flashlight, camera, drone, headlamp, RC car, and so on. Safe Protection and Recyclable Get the CE, FCC and RoHS certified. Totally against overheating and leakage, allowing you to charge and use safely. 3000mAh Rechargeable NiMH Battery POWO18B,3.7V Large Capacity Flat Top Batter...
